special_powers.name: SONAR SURVEILLANCE
special_powers.description: The Dark Knight can use the Sharpshooter ability. He can also use Outwit but the target character must be within 6 squares and does not need to be within line of fire.

special_powers.name: ARMORED BUT AGILE
special_powers.description: The Dark Knight can use Super Senses and Toughness.

special_powers.name: MINION: ATTACK FROM THE SHADOWS
special_powers.description: When Shadow Assassin has no tokens, occupies hindering terrain, and is within 8 squares of a character named Ra's Al Ghul or Henri Ducard, he may be given a close combat action as a free action.

special_powers.name: TOOLS OF THEATRICALITY AND DECEPTION
special_powers.description: Shadow Assassin can use Enhancement and Smoke Cloud.  When Shadow Assassin occupies hindering terrain, modify his damage value by +1.

special_powers.name: YOUR PLAN IS TO BLACKMAIL THIS PERSON?
special_powers.description: When any effect of an opposing character would counter a power or ability possessed by Bruce Wayne or an adjacent friendly character, after that action resolves roll a d6; on a result of 3-4, place an action token on the opposing character; on a result of 5-6, deal the opposing character 1 penetrating damage.

special_powers.name: THE DARK KNIGHT
special_powers.description: Give Bruce Wayne a power action that deals no pushing damage and replace this character with DKR #001 The Dark Knight or DKR #029 The Batman on its orange starting line. Existing action tokens on this character and action tokens for this action are applied to the replacement. This power can't be countered.

special_powers.name: SAFETY IN NUMBERS
special_powers.description: Arkham Asylum Inmate modifies his defense value by +1 when adjacent to another character named Arkham Inmate if not already modified by this effect.

special_powers.name: CRAZED
special_powers.description: When Arkham Asylum Inmate is attacked and the result of the attack is a miss, you can roll a d6; on the result of 1-4 he automatically breaks away and can move up to 3 squares, and on a result of 5-6 he can immediately make a close combat attack as a free action.

special_powers.name: FORMER CELLMATE
special_powers.description: Arkham Asylum Inmate can use the Batman Enemy team abilty.

special_powers.name: DETAIN FOR QUESTIONING
special_powers.description: Opposing characters subtract 1 from their d6 rolls when breaking away from GCPD officer.

special_powers.name: MINION: FOLLOWING ORDERS
special_powers.description: When a higher point friendly character with the Police keyword uses Leadership, GCPD Officer is considered adjacent to that character.

special_powers.name: BACKUP
special_powers.description: When GCPD officer is adjacent to another character with the Police keyword, he can use Perplex, but he can only target characters with the Police keyword.

special_powers.name: HELP YOUR BROTHER OFFICERS
special_powers.description: When GCPD Officer makes an attack roll and the result is doubles (other than a critical miss), you may remove an action token from an adjacent friendly character with a point value of 100 of less after the actions resolve.

special_powers.name: WHAT'S WAYNE'S IS MINE
special_powers.description: Before the beginning of the game, choose a team ability possessed by an opposing character. When an opposing character adjacent to Catwoman using the chosen team ability makes an attack and rolls doubles, remove all action tokens from Catwoman.

special_powers.name: BLACK CAT
special_powers.description: Catwoman can use Leap/Climb and Stealth.

special_powers.name: ZIPLINE
special_powers.description: The Joker's Henchman #1 can use Leap/Climb and Running Shot. Once per turn, an adjacent friendly character who possesses a keyword or team ability possessed by the Joker's Henchman #1 can use Leap/Climb until the end of the turn.

special_powers.name: MINION: MOLDED BY BANE
special_powers.description: When making an attack and a friendly character named Bane is within 8 squares, modify Mercenary's attack value or damage value by +1.

special_powers.name: TRY A LITTLE OF THIS...
special_powers.description: Mercenary can use Support; if the target possesses a keyword or team ability that Mercenary possesses, you may add the number of action tokens on the target to the amount of damage healed.

special_powers.name: YOUR GOOD LUCK, HIS BAD LUCK
special_powers.description: Once per turn, when Two-Face makes an attack and his attack total is 1 less than his target's defense value, he may immediately make an attack against a different opposing character adjacent to the previous target.

special_powers.name: MINION: STEP INTO THE LINE OF FIRE
special_powers.description: When Falcone's Bodyguard is adjacent to a character named Salvatore Maroni or Carmine Falcone, that character may use Shape Change, but on a result of 3-4 the two may immediately be placed in each others' squares and Falcone's Bodyguard must be attacked instead.

special_powers.name: MINION: COORDINATED ASSAULT
special_powers.description: When GCPD Riot Officer is within 8 squares of a higher point character that possesses the Police team ability, he does not need to be adjacent to that character to use the Police team ability.

special_powers.name: A SECRET AGENDA
special_powers.description: Miranda Tate is a wild card, but can only use the team abilities of adjacent characters. She may be given a free action to copy the team ability of an opposing character instead of a friendly character.

special_powers.name: HIDDEN TALENTS
special_powers.description: Miranda Tate can use Close Combat Expert and Outwit.

special_powers.name: ALFRED, I NEED YOU
special_powers.description: When Alfred Pennyworth is given a move action and it resolves, if a friendly character possesses a team ability or keyword possessed by Alfred Pennyworth within 2 squares and line of fire, you may place Alfred Pennyworth adjacent to that character.

special_powers.name: WHY DO WE FALL?
special_powers.description: Alfred Pennyworth can use Perplex and Support.

special_powers.name: KNOCKOUT PUNCH
special_powers.description: Bane can use Charge and Force Blast; when he uses Charge, after actions resolve, he can use Force Blast as a free action against the target of the attack. When he uses Force Blast, on a result of 4-6, also give an action token to the target.

special_powers.name: TRAINING AMONG CRIMINALS
special_powers.description: Master Bruce Wayne can use Perplex and Shape Change.  When he uses Perplex, he can only target himself.

special_powers.name: I GOT PEOPLE EVERYWHERE
special_powers.description: Salvatore Maroni can use Mind Control as if he had a range of 8. When he does, he ignores the effects of characters and terrain on line of fire and if his target has the Gotham City Underworld keyword, modifies Salvatore Maroni's attack value by +2.

special_powers.name: I BELIEVE IN HARVEY DENT
special_powers.description: Friendly characters adjacent to Harvey Dent at the beginning of the turn can use Willpower until the end of the turn.

special_powers.name: THE SCUM SHOULD BE AFRAID OF ME
special_powers.description: For each opposing character adjacent to Harvey Dent at the beginning of your turn, you may modify his attack or defense value (choose per character) by +1 until the beginning of your next turn.

special_powers.name: THE A.D.A. IS A FRIEND
special_powers.description: Rachel Dawes can use Perplex, but can only target friendly characters. She can use Perplex twice each turn if she targets a friendly character possessing Batman Ally or Police team ability both times, but can't target the same character twice.

special_powers.name: TAKE ANOTHER SHOT!
special_powers.description: Once per turn, when The Joker's Henchman #2 is within 8 squares of a character named Joker or Sgt. Joker, he can use Probability Control, but can only use it to target friendly characters that possess a keyword or team ability possessed by The Joker's Henchman #2 and only to reroll attack rolls.

special_powers.name: THEY TOOK OUR GUNS, OUR UNIFORMS...
special_powers.description: Friendly characters possessing the Underworld team ability adjacent to The Joker as Sgt. can use Shape Change and the Police team ability.

special_powers.name: GET THESE MEN INTO POSITION!
special_powers.description: Give Lt. Gordon a power action; you can immediately give him and up to two adjacent friendly characters who possess a team ability or keyword possessed by Lt. Gordon a move action as a free action, replacing all characters' speed values with Lt. Gordon's unmodified speed value.

special_powers.name: INTERPOSE
special_powers.description: Ra's al Ghul can use Leap/Climb.  Whenever an adjacent friendly character uses Shape Change and the result is 1-4, Ra's Al Ghul and the friendly character may immediately be placed in each others' squares.

special_powers.name: IS RA'S AL GHUL IMMORTAL?
special_powers.description: When Henri Ducard takes damage, stop turning his dial when this power is revealed.  Henri Ducard can use Regeneration, but if he does not heal when he uses this power, deal him 1 unavoidable damage.

special_powers.name: SURELY YOU DON'T BEGRUDGE ME DUAL IDENTITIES?
special_powers.description: Henri Ducard can use Outwit and Shape Change.

special_powers.name: MONEY ISN'T POWER-FEAR IS
special_powers.description: Carmine Falcone can use Incapacitate. When he does, roll a d6; on a result of 5-6, Carmine Falcone is not given an action token for this action.

special_powers.name: THE BOSS
special_powers.description: Carmine Falcone can use Leadership; when he does, on a result of 3-4, you can remove an action token from a lower point friendly character that shares a keyword with him that is within 6 squares.

special_powers.name: FEAR AND CONTROL
special_powers.description: Scarecrow can use Poison; When a character takes damage from his Poison, Scarecrow can immediately use Mind Control as a free action targeting that character and take no damage based on its point value.

special_powers.name: HEAD OF WAYNE INDUSTRIES
special_powers.description: Lucius Fox can use Leadership and Perplex. When he uses Leadership, he may remove tokens from characters with a higher point value if they possess the Batman Ally team ability.

special_powers.name: HAND-PICKED MEN
special_powers.description: Commissioner Gordon can use Mastermind, he can choose to deal the damage to a friendly character that has a higher point value if they possess a keyword or team ability that Commissioner Gordon possesses.

special_powers.name: GETTING THINGS DONE
special_powers.description: Commissioner Gordon can use Leadership and Outwit; when he uses Leadership, in addition to regular effects, on a result of 4 add one action to your action total and on a result of 6 he can remove up to two total action tokens from up to two friendly adjacent characters if they share a keyword or team ability with him.

special_powers.name: TELL YOUR MEN THEY WORK FOR ME
special_powers.description: The Joker can use Mastermind. The Joker can only transfer damage to the same friendly character until that character is KO'd.

special_powers.name: WHAT DOESN'T KILL ME MAKES ME STRANGER
special_powers.description: Give The Joker a double power action. Roll a d6 and subtract 1 from the result of each friendly character on the map and add 1 to the result for each opposing character on the map. Heal The Joker of damage equal to the result.

special_powers.name: GLIDER CAPE
special_powers.description: The Batman can use Charge and the Flight ability.

special_powers.name: SUMMON THE BATS
special_powers.description: The Batman can use Smoke Cloud and Incapacitate as if he had 2 targets.

special_powers.name: WE'RE IN THIS TOGETHER
special_powers.description: When you reveal your force, if there is another character on your force named Sgt. Gordon, Lt. Gordon or Commissioner Grodon, then Batman possesses the Police keyword and team ability and that character possesses the Batman Ally team ability. If Batman is adjacent to that character, they each get +1 to their attack (if not already modified by this effect).

special_powers.name: STRIKE FROM THE SHADOWS
special_powers.description: When Batman occupies hindering terrain or an elevation that is higher than his target, modify his targets' defense values by -1 and the attack deals penetrating damage.

special_powers.name: BATMAN DOESN'T KILL
special_powers.description: When Batman hits a target with an attack and the result of the roll is doubles, after the attack resolves he may immediately use Incapacitate as a free action to attack the same target.

special_powers.name: NOBODY CORNERS THE CAT
special_powers.description: Catwoman can use Leap/Climb. When Catwoman is adjacent to an opposing character at the beginning of your turn, before you give any other actions you may give Catwoman a move action as a free action.

special_powers.name: ONE SECOND SHE'S INVISIBLE, THE NEXT...
special_powers.description: Catwoman can use Charge and Stealth.

special_powers.name: I HAVE VOWED TO DESTROY YOU
special_powers.description: At the beginning of the game, choose a team ability or keyword possessed by an opposing character. Modifying the attack value of Bane and adjacent friendly characters and the damage value of Bane by +1 when they attack opposing characters who can use the chosen team ability or has the chosen keyword.

special_powers.name: YOUR STRENGTH WILL BE TESTED
special_powers.description: Bane can use Super Strength; when Bane is holding an object and uses Flurry, it is not removed from the game until after actions resolved.

special_powers.name: THEY SAY THEY BROUGHT THE CLOWN'S BODY
special_powers.description: The Joker can use Outwit and Shape Change.

special_powers.name: I GOTTA GET ME ONE OF THESE!
special_powers.description: Sgt. Gordon can use any of the following powers and abilities if he begins his turn adjacent to a friendly character who can use them: Carry, Charge, Flight, Leap/Climb, Running Shot, and Swim.

special_powers.name: GUNS BLAZING
special_powers.description: Give Sgt. Gordon a range combat action. After the ranged combat attack resolves, he may make a second ranged combat attack as a free action if he still possesses this power.

special_powers.name: ON HIS OWN
special_powers.description: Batman's combat values can't be modified by other friendly characters.

special_powers.name: ON THE RUN
special_powers.description: Batman can use Charge and Leap/Climb. When he uses Charge, he can use Plasticity and he can use Charge normally, or, he can be given a close combat action as a free action and then move.

special_powers.name: ALTER EGO: BATMAN
special_powers.description: Give Bruce Wayne a power action that deals no pushing damage and replace this character with DKR #201 Batman on its orange starting line.  Existing action tokens on this character and action tokens for this action are applied to the replacement.  This power can't be countered.

special_powers.name: CAT BURGLAR
special_powers.description: Catwoman can use Flurry. Give Catwoman a free action when she is adjacent to a heavy or light object and exchange that object for any other object on the map or held by another character; after doing so, roll a d6; on a result of 1-3, remove the exchanged object from the game.

special_powers.name: I'LL BRING THIS CITY DOWN
special_powers.description: Give Bane a double power action when he occupies printed hindering terrain and place a SPECIAL marker in the square he occupies; that area is clear terrain until the end of the game.

special_powers.name: ROCKET LAUNCHER
special_powers.description: Bane can use Ranged Combat Expert as if he had a range value of 8.

special_powers.name: IT WILL TAKE MORE THAN THAT
special_powers.description: Bane possesses Mastermind and Toughness.  This power cannot be countered.

special_powers.name: ANTIDOTE CARRIER
special_powers.description: Rachell Dawes and friendly characters adjacent to her ignore the use of Poison by opposing characters and cannot be targeted by Incapacitate.

special_powers.name: WORKING BOTH SIDES
special_powers.description: John Blake can use Outwit, but can only counter team abilities as if they were powers.

special_powers.name: I GOT YOUR BACK
special_powers.description: The Joker's Henchman #3 and adjacent friendly characters that possess a team ability or keyword possessed by The Joker's Henchman #3 modify their defense values by +1 until the end of the turn for each action token they are marked with.

special_powers.name: I GOT ENOUGH C4 ON ME TO BLOW THIS PLACE WIDE OPEN
special_powers.description: When an opposing character takes damage from The Joker's Henchman #4's attack, deal the same amount of damage to an object or square of terrain in the same square or adjacent to the target.

special_powers.name: THE CLOWN'S GOT GOOD GRENADES
special_powers.description: The Joker's Henchman #4 can use Energy Explosion. When he does and hits, roll a d6; on the result of a 6, the damage dealt is penetrating.

special_powers.name: NO, I KILL THE BUS DRIVER
special_powers.description: The Joker can use Energy Explosion. At the beginning of your turn, if The Joker is adjacent to an opposing character with 2 action tokens, he may make a close combat attack targeting that character as a free action. This attack deals penetrating damage.

special_powers.name: THIS PLACE IS MINE! GET OUT! GET OUT!
special_powers.description: When Arkham Asylum Escapee attacks an opposing character occupying the same printed area of hindering terrain as he does, modify his attack value by +2.
